Chart.gdpDesc: GDP stands for Gross Domestic Product. It is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year.
Chart.capitaDesc: Per Capita Income is the average income of a country's citizens. It is calculated by dividing the country's total income by its population.
Chart.lifeDesc: Life expectancy is the average number of years a person is expected to live based on the year of their birth.
Chart.populationDesc: Population stands for the total number of people living in a country.
Chart.unemploymentDesc: Unemployment rate is the percentage of the total labor force that is unemployed but actively seeking employment and willing to work.
